org.apache.juli

类 VerbatimFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Formatter
      • org.apache.juli.VerbatimFormatter

  • public class VerbatimFormatter
extends Formatter
    Outputs the just the log message with no additional elements. Stack traces are not logged. Log messages are separated by System.lineSeparator(). This is intended for use by access logs and the like that need complete control over the output format.
